item.title: Forum based on posts that I added
item.dc:creator: @seankroes seankroes
item.description:
@seankroes wrote:

Okay. Fine.
[hr]
I apologize for being so rude before, sean. I could have said a different word or phrased it differently so it wasn’t so mean.
However, it doesn’t change my opinion on the matter.
[/quote]

I accept your apology.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum based on posts that I added
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Justin Bieber, post:16, topic:550348”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669258.msg4475531#msg4475531 date=1425638597]

[quote]General Server Discussion is to discuss about your Server
Not your garbage forum ranks.

Hey hey… dont be rude…

[/quote]
There’s a difference between being rude and being honest.

You’re “showing off” something that’s been done 1000 times.

What’s special about your ranks? Nothing.
[/quote]
I think you were being quite rude by calling his ranks “garbage”… that was a rather direct and harsh comment to make, whether true or otherwise.[/quote]
Okay. Fine.
[hr]
I apologize for being so rude before, sean. I could have said a different word or phrased it differently so it wasn’t so mean.
However, it doesn’t change my opinion on the matter.

Read full topic
